title: The Circle viewers slate Emma Willis' scraped back hairdo again
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Emma Willis served another strong look on tonight's live episode of Channel 4's The Circle.

The presenter, 43, donned a sleek black trouser suit on the show, with a silky trim in the collar.

She paired it with gold jewellery and minimal makeup with her hair scraped back into a messy bun.

Last week, her Molly Mae-eqsue hairdo got terrible reviews from viewers, and this week's style is not faring much better.

(Image: C4)

(Image: C4)

Viewers took to Twitter to gush about how beautiful Emma looked, but they weren't keen on the hair.

"Emma Willis is a 10", said one.

"Emma Willis is underrated she is beautiful", said another.

"Only reason why I love watching the live is because of Emma's outfits", added a third.

(Image: Channel 4)

But the hairdo failed to impress as viewers slammed the new longer length and bun.

"Who is Emma's hair stylist. They need the sack. Come on Em don't listen to everyone. Sometimes they get it so wrong x" said one.

"Emma Willis is a very beautiful woman but what in earth is going on with her hair", questioned another.

(Image: Channel 4)

"What have they done to Emma Willis hair looks b****y awful!" claimed another.

"Emma Willis going for the *just got out the shower and someone’s knocked at the door so I’ll scrape my hair back* look", added another.

*The Circle airs at 10pm on Channel 4
description: The presenter's hair style has failed to impress viewers once again in this week's live episode of The Circle
